tier.item: then.R bush spirit female S:3S-eat-O:3S wife-P:3S-and then
`Then (the) female bush spirit ate his wife, and (the spirit) swallowed (the wife) and
(the wife) went down inside (the spirit's) stomach.' (D'Jernes and D'Jernes, n.d.)

then.R bush spirit female S:3S-eat-O:3S wife-P:3S-and then S:3S-swallow-O:3S-and then S:3S-go down stomach-P:3S inside-P:3S
Then (the) female bush spirit ate his wife, and (the spirit) swallowed (the wife) and (the wife) went down inside (the spirit's) stomach.
`We sat down in order to wait for Bakai.' (Hyslop 2001:419)
